results.title: Effect and Safety of Adding Metformin to Insulin Therapy in Treating Adolescents With Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus: An Updated Meta-Analysis of 10 Randomized Controlled Trials
results.text_hl: However, no statistical difference was achieved, although @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ numerically lowered the @<m>DISEASE_Headache_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020773 @@@TIDD@@@ in 9 months compared with placebo.
